content: a beginner pattern to crochet this cute whale amigurumi for your baby room decor just put it on your changing table to distract baby or hang it above your crib for an adorable baby mobile it s a perfect birth gift or baby shower gift beginner friendly only single_crochet stitches lots of pictures and detailed explanations in the pdf pattern only pattern details final size with indicated yarn and gauge the whale is 12 cm long 4 7 and 6 cm high without the crown 2 3 the crown is 2 cm high 0 8 level beginner stitches and techniques magic_ring single_crochet us crochet notations language english illustrated step-by-step photos materials 2 5mm crochet hook yarn o scheepjes stone washed 805 blue apatite o dmc happy cotton #794 mustard yellow o dmc happy cotton #761 off-white o dmc cotton perle n°8 shade 310 black to embroider the mouth fiberfill a pair of 8mm safety eyes tapestry needle stitch marker s or a piece of thread to mark your round beginning ball point pins for assembly please note this is a downloadable product pdf not a physical item the pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the free version of this pattern supported by ads can be found on my blog at https //octopuscrochet com/ you may make items to sell from my patterns i e on etsy at craft fairs only in small quantity but i ask that you link back to my blog and provide credit for the pattern if you sell items on etsy or other marketplace you have to mention my website in the description of the item and you may not use my photography to sell the finished product this pattern is not meant for wholesale or for big businesses to profit on my patterns are created by me and although i strive to make them as clear and detailed as possible there is always a chance for human error or need of clarification i am happy to address any questions or concerns
